normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Going solar in Chennai just got a whole lot easier, thanks to the renewed rooftop solar subsidy scheme by the Tamil Nadu Energy Development Agency (TEDA). Forget sweating it out this Onam worrying about electricity bills; generate your own power!
normalised: Good news, folks! Going solar in Chennai just got a whole lot easier, thanks to the renewed rooftop solar subsidy scheme by the Tamil Nadu Energy Development Agency (T E D A). Forget sweating it out this Onam worrying about electricity bills; generate your own power!

unnormalised: The scheme offers a significant subsidy, especially for smaller installations. We're talking about potentially slashing installation costs by up to 40% for systems up to 3 kW. Think about what you could do with those savings – extra biryani for the family, maybe?
normalised: The scheme offers a significant subsidy, especially for smaller installations. We're talking about potentially slashing installation costs by up to forty percent for systems up to three kilowatt. Think about what you could do with those savings – extra biryani for the family, maybe?

unnormalised: The state government has allocated Rs. 200 Crore for this initiative, aiming to add another 200 MW of rooftop solar capacity across the state. Application process is streamlined via the TEDA portal. Don't delay, chaps! Remember Sharmaji down the street who installed his system last year? He's practically laughing all the way to the bank with those reduced bills. Check eligibility & application details before the deadlines. Last date is 30/09/2024.
normalised: The state government has allocated rupees two hundred crore for this initiative, aiming to add another two hundred megawatt of rooftop solar capacity across the state. Application process is streamlined via the T E D A portal. Don't delay, chaps! Remember Sharmaji down the street who installed his system last year? He's practically laughing all the way to the bank with those reduced bills. Check eligibility and application details before the deadlines. Last date is thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Even if you live slightly outside Chennai within 20 km, you might be eligible. Get cracking and reduce your carbon footprint and your electricity bill at the same time!
normalised: Even if you live slightly outside Chennai within twenty kilometer, you might be eligible. Get cracking and reduce your carbon footprint and your electricity bill at the same time!
